frozen_definition.name: SubClarity
frozen_definition.signal_source: Subscription tracking reviews show 'too difficult to navigate', users want apps that don't 'charge subscription to cancel subscriptions'
frozen_definition.description: Transparent subscription manager that shows true costs, sends cancellation reminders, and provides one-tap cancellation assistance without requiring its own subscription
frozen_definition.target_user: Consumers overwhelmed by 12+ subscriptions who struggle with hidden fees and difficult cancellation processes
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Average person has 12+ subscriptions, spending $100+ monthly with complaints of 'hidden menus, long phone calls' for cancellation
core_loop: Connect bank account for automatic detection
frozen_definition.differentiation: Free core features with revenue from affiliate partnerships, not subscription fees from users
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Revenue from partnerships with alternative services and premium analytics, not user subscriptions

pricing.trial_strategy: Core features always free, optional premium insights
